name: Gearwaves
summary: Shopping platform with content administration and payments processing
description: Modern shopping platform built with MERN stack (Mongo, Express, React and Node.js). Mapbox integration, user roles, CRUD operations capabilities as an admin user, and many more features from the API. Fully responsive.

name: Beatmon
summary: Social Networking Service for music producers
description: A social network where a producer can share short snippets of his stuff, give and receive feedback from other producers. Built with React, Node.js and Firebase, with the capability of encoding/decoding, cropping and uploading Wav/Mp3 files right in the browser. Likes, comments, notifications, infinite scroll and all the essential stuff of any social media service. Fully responsive using Material UI.

name: Ixtlan Clothing
summary: E-Commerce platform with shopping cart and payments processing
description: Simple E-Commerce platform built with React, Redux Saga, Node.js and Firebase. Implementing Stripe and OAuth. Shopping cart and a fully responsive layout using Styled Components.
